text: Vladimir Genrikhovich Dolgov (Владимир Генрихович Долгов, 11 May 1960 – 10 January 2022) was a Soviet backstroke swimmer.databaseOlympics He won the bronze medal in the men's 100m backstroke event at the 1980 Summer Olympics in Moscow, USSR.Sports Reference profile Dolgov died from stomach cancer in Huntersville, North Carolina on 10 January 2022, at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet swimmers Category:Deaths from stomach cancer
title: Vladimir Dolgov
